markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Angelic Wings](/Spells.aspx?ID=2094)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=640" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=645" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 262 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Bloodline**
[Angelic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=20)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 3 rounds
</row>

</column>

---

Wings of pure light spread out from your back, granting you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. Your wings cast [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) in a 30-foot radius. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as [_gentle landing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1542).

---
**Heightened (5th)** The duration increases to 1 minute.
name: Angelic Wings

summary_markdown: Wings of pure light spread out from your back, granting you a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
text: Angelic Wings Two Actions Source Player Core 2 pg. 262 1.1 Bloodline Angelic Duration 3 rounds --- Wings of pure light spread out from your back, granting you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. Your wings cast bright light in a 30-foot radius. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as gentle landing . --- Heightened (5th) The duration increases to 1 minute.
